title: New Legendary Kindred skin idea (Cosmic Star)
body:
I had this idea last week while looking at Dark Star skins and Cosmic skins and since Kindred is about to go 3 whole years without a skin I thought this would be a good idea to share.

It would be a cross between Dark Star and Cosmic where Lamb could have the Cosmic theme and Wolf would have a Dark Star theme.
Their ultimate could be a universe that then gets consumed by a black hole at the end of it and there Mark being the Dark Star or just a Star. 
Maybe when Lamb marks a player it would be something to resemble a galaxy or Universe. And when Wolf marks a camp the mark could be a Dark Star.
Their voice could have them go back in fourth about feeding the Dark Star and protecting the Universe or something related to one of the 2 themes since they kinda cross over with each other.

I feel like this would be a prefect theme for Kindred and the Cosmic/Dark Star line of skins and I really hope Riot takes this idea into consideration.

replies.body: and maybe have a toggle where kindred becomes the dark star and wolf becomes cosmic?
Then it would be an Ultimate Skin
eh not really. just one alternate form is too lack luster for an ultimate skin that'd be worse than GG MF
I like this idea a lot!!
One week after I this post Riot shows off new Dark Star skins lol.
